value.title: Better Together: Striking The Balance Between Artificial And Human Intelligence

value.title: Factbox-Investors are betting on rent-a-robot startups in Silicon ValleyÂ

value.title: Even experts are too quick to rely on AI explanations, study finds
value.excerpt: According to a new study, even simple explanations given by AI systems are enough to mislead even experts into trusting the systems.
